Start your digital business

Promote your business with B_system. The web design tool with the most complete design system.

"People ignore design that ignores people"

Work in an agile way

B_system will help you create responsive web pages with very little effort.

"People ignore design that ignores people"

Enjoy the great result

It is made with completely scalable and reusable components, so you only have to worry about creating your wonderful project.

"People ignore design that ignores people"

B_system is a multipurpose HTML5 template that will help you build responsive web pages with very little effort. It is made with fully scalable and reusable components, so you only have to worry about creating your wonderful project.

Our work methodology

1. Exploration phase

Explore new concepts, products, services, ventures, brands, and systems.

2. Empathy phase

A deep understanding of the needs of the users involved in the solution.

3. Definition phase

Staying with what really adds value and brings us to new interesting perspectives.

4. Ideation phase

In this phase, activities favor expansive thinking and we eliminate value judgments.

5. Prototyping

Building prototypes makes ideas tangible and helps us visualize possible solutions.

6. Testing phase

This phase helps us to identify significant improvements and faults to be solved.

1. Exploration phase

Explore new concepts, products, services, ventures, brands, and systems.

2. Empathy phase

A deep understanding of the needs of the users involved in the solution.

3. Definition phase

Staying with what really adds value and brings us to new interesting perspectives.

4. Ideation phase

In this phase, activities favor expansive thinking and we eliminate value judgments.

5. Prototyping

Building prototypes makes ideas tangible and helps us visualize possible solutions.

6. Testing phase

This phase helps us to identify significant improvements and faults to be solved.
